azurerm_policy_assignment.description: Configures the specified Policy Definition at the specified Scope.

name.description: The name of the Policy Assignment. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scope.description: The Scope at which the Policy Assignment should be applied, which must be a Resource ID (such as Subscription e.g. `/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-000000000000` or a Resource Group e.g.`/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup`). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

policy_definition_id.description: The ID of the Policy Definition to be applied at the specified Scope.

location.description: The Azure location where this policy assignment should exist. This is required when an Identity is assigned. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

description.description: A description to use for this Policy Assignment. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

display_name.description: A friendly display name to use for this Policy Assignment. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

parameters.description: Parameters for the policy definition. This field is a JSON object that maps to the Parameters field from the Policy Definition. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

not_scopes.description: A list of the Policy Assignment's excluded scopes. The list must contain Resource IDs (such as Subscriptions e.g. `/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-000000000000` or Resource Groups e.g.`/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup`).

type.description: The Managed Service Identity Type of this Policy Assignment. Possible values are `SystemAssigned` (where Azure will generate a Service Principal for you), or `None` (no use of a Managed Service Identity).

principal_id.description: The Principal ID of this Policy Assignment if `type` is `SystemAssigned`.

tenant_id.description: The Tenant ID of this Policy Assignment if `type` is `SystemAssigned`.

create.description: Used when creating the Policy Assignment.

update.description: Used when updating the Policy Assignment.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Policy Assignment.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Policy Assignment.
